mapper.select: select ec.id, ec.title, ec.price, ec.cover, ec.lesson_num as lessonNum, ecd.description, et.name as teacherName, es1.title as subjectLevelOne, es2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et on et.id= ec.teacher_id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 on es1.id=ec.subject_parent_id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 on es1.id=ec.subject_id WHERE ec.id=#{courseId}
